attributes.action: Change the eligibility for the self employment scheme
attributes.additional_details: To stop self employed workers leaving work and also to help them cover the costs of running their self employed business.Also reduce the unemployment rate as after lockdown many will be forced to leave due to insufficient funding to proceed
attributes.background: Change the eligibility for the self employment scheme so only one years self assessment is required not 2 years as over 3 million are not currently eligible and are not getting any support from the government despite packages of 4.8 billion being introduced to help the nation through lockdown
